name: Hoverloop
description: Hoverloop is a Multiplayer Arcade Arena Combat game.Fight against or work together with friends in splitscreen/online multiplayer. If you would rather go solo, that's also possible, with AI-Bots in a variety of game modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 6200U Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX770m Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1070 Storage: 4 GB available space
